description.value:
Vaskos can take special lucid actions during the Kalapal Clash as he wills for help from within the Dream. He can only use each action once throughout the entire Clash.

  • Second Chance: As a free action triggered when Vaskos drops to 0 hit points, he can use this to recover to 1 hit point plus [[/r 17d6]] hit points and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded}.

  • Once More: As a free action triggered on a turn beginning and it is not Vaskos' turn, he can use this to immediately take a turn prior to the triggering turn.

  • Leaf Bracer: As a free action triggered when Vaskos recovers hit points, Vaskos can recover the maximum amount of hit points from any dice rolled.

  • Healing Light: As 2 actions, Vaskos can fully recover the health of his partner. If they were unconscious and/or dying, they immediately Stand and are no longer Dying and Unconscious.
